weekly_top_story.headline: Russia uses nuclear-capable missile in 'massive strike' on Ukraine
weekly_top_story.summary: Russia launched a large-scale missile attack on Ukraine that included at least one nuclear-capable Kinzhal hypersonic missile, escalating concerns about the war’s intensity and the risks of broader European and nuclear instability.

stories.headline: Russia uses nuclear-capable missile in 'massive strike' on Ukraine
stories.summary: In one of the largest recent barrages, Russia struck multiple Ukrainian cities with missiles, including a nuclear-capable Kinzhal, underscoring the ongoing escalation risks for European security and global energy and grain markets.
